snippet: The Federal Reserve sent record earnings to the Treasury Department, reflecting the vast expansion of the central bank’s investment portfolio.
abstract: Federal Reserve announces that it sent $88.9 billion in profit to Treasury Department, record that reflects vast expansion of central bank’s investment portfolio.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve sent record earnings to the Treasury Department, reflecting the vast expansion of the central bank’s investment portfolio.

headline.seo: Fed’s Transferred $88.9 Billion to Treasury in 2012
headline.main: Fed Profit of $88.9 Billion Sent to Treasury in 2012
headline.print_headline: Fed Profit of $88.9 Billion Sent to Treasury in 2012
